name: Word Island - Relaxing Game
description:
Would you like to relax, exercise your brain, and win real cash while playing your favorite new word puzzle game?Word Island, this brand new and addicting word game where you can win real cash playing your favorite crossword word puzzles .

Word Gameplay
- Challenging and fun words to uncover.
- Uncover the hidden words on the crossword puzzle!
- Stuck on a word? Use prop to reveal letters to help win the level!
- Make as many words as possible! Some might be the bonus words where you can win coins!

Rewards Gameplay
- Exciting ways to win money and score rewards!
- Instant Win Scratches where you can win $2,50 in Real Cash, instantly!
- Daily and Monthly sweepstakes where winners can take home $5,00!
- Win Cash on our Bonus scraping card! Keep scraping card for even more chances of increased rewards and in game items.

Get Word Island for the best word games free for word search, crossword and word game fans and addicts!

Privacy Policy - https://docs.google.com/document/d/e/2PACX-1vRsz5q0sLyQpqOGyJDoWj493JsCp3C-2V9V4XEB8QPhRSvvZDQwePI7ylmmCqJqtbVUlvnRATrM2X6u/pub

All sweepstakes are free to enter and chosen at random.

These sweepstakes are devised as non-gambling promotions and are intended solely for entertainment purposes.

Apple Inc. does not sponsor, nor is any way affiliated with Word Island and/or the sweepstakes prizes.
